entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 14 April 2023
